article_title: Can Donald Trump really save America?
article_text:
Trump’s election could be catalyst for the restoration of constitutional government

Trump said he’d work to persuade Congress to pass legislation, instead of resorting to unilateral action

Congress may reassert its constitutional prerogatives, instead of delegating power to the president

article_metadata.news-keywords: donald, trump, ted, cruz, gop, republicans, president, convention, primaries, obama, election, campaign
article_metadata.description: Let’s assume Donald Trump will be the Republican nominee for president. Perish the thought? Most pundits and political prognosticators have tended to focus on the worst-case scenarios surrounding a Trump nomination. I certainly have.
article_metadata.title: Can Donald Trump really save America? | The Sacramento Bee
